charity_translations.title: Translation of dynamic elements of the CharityKit

block.title: Block Charity
block.description: The Charity block is displayed to your customers just before the choice of their means of payment: it offers them the option of rounding their basket for the benefit of an association.

popin.title: Popin Charity
popin.description: The Charity pop-up opens when you click on the "Round up the amount of my basket" checkbox. It allows you to choose the beneficiary association and the amount of the donation.
